<< From:    thecode@... (Soulstice Omega)

 OOC: Hey, what do you RPGers think about being able to use a drone for
 storyline purposes? If you made it your character and posted for it as an
 individual as you would any other bot, could a drone be one of your
 characters?...
 >>

(As long as the drone was sentient and if he ever gets destroyed a new 
sentient drone just doesn't take the other's place every time)
